title: syntax error ends with duplication: "...expecting { or {"
body:
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
    s := []string
    {"A", "B"}
    fmt.Println(s)
}

goplay.go:4: syntax error: unexpected semicolon or newline, expecting { or {
goplay.go:5: syntax error: unexpected }, expecting := or = or comma

The line 4 syntax error ends "{ or {" and should end "{".
